docs.lead_paragraph: YOU might have noticed New York men walking with an extra bounce in their step yesterday, and the most likely reason was that they'd heard the good news: fresh scientific studies show that they may be proud carriers of the highest sperm counts in the country. None of the researchers would explain why this was so. "The important thing is that, since we don't have a causal relationship, no comment should be made," said Dr. Harry Fisch, who carried out one of the studies as director of the Male Infertility Center at Columbia-Presbyterian Medical Center.

headline.main: We're No. 1: Get the Angelenos Back to the Gym
